title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 4, pt. 527 - State Reimbursement For Payment To Out-of-state Providers Of Medical Care And Services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 4, pt. 527 - State Reimbursement For Payment To Out-of-state Providers Of Medical Care And Services

State Regulations
§ 527.1 - Maximum reimbursable fee schedule

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 4, pt. 527

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 34[3][f], 363- a[2], 365, 365-a, 367-a, 368-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
